pages.title: Meteorites
pages.text: $(thing)Meteorites$() spawn during world generation on the surface or underground, and vary in size. They generally contain a $(l:appliedenergistics2:simple_tools/sky_stone_chests)Sky Stone Chest$(/l) which can contain various ingredients required for advanced technology. You can use a $(l:appliedenergistics2:simple_tools/meteorite_compass)Meteorite Compass$(/l) to locate $(thing)meteorites$() near you and as you explore.
